name: Is Today Another Day?
description:
The last time you went outside feels like ages... 

Today may be an other day, but you'll have to solve all the enigmas of your apartment to make it happen. 

Important informations: 

  • Mouse & Keyboard (WASD or ZQSD) 
  • Sound Required
  • Runs best on Chrome
  • Not supported on recent Macbooks with M1 chip (we are working on it !) 

This game is a collaborative project between two friends. 

A lot week ends have been dedicated to it, and we are happy to finally share it with you ;) 

If you beat the game please tell us your time in the comments! 

Pierre (Twitter/Linkedin) & Tom (Instagram/Linkedin)
